_comment: Pretty obvious what goes in some of these spots but I am here to help! _comment = comments. :)
JSON with enabled can be toggles on and off to customize the webpage to your needs
link to some plane text total raised data used on Live webpage
start date, MUST have 0 infront of single digit numbers.

StartDate._comment: if StartDate is enabled true it will auto switch to the Live webpage when the date is hit
if IsLive is set to true it will display Live webpage regardless if enabled is true or false

_comment: impact is the impact of your marathon! raised is how much you raised, hours is how many hours played charities is amount of charities you've raised for.
